title: Direction of electric field near isolated charge

content.question: An isolated positive charge q is in the plane of the page, as shown above. The directions of the electric field vectors at points P and T, which are also in the plane of the page, are given by which of the following?

choices.label: Point P Point T Left Right
Point P Point T Right Left
Point P Point T Left Toward the top of the page
Point P Point T Right Toward the top of the page
Point P Point T Left Toward the bottom of the page

content.answer: Point P Point T Left Toward the bottom of the page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
